death.attack.conhecimentoCurse: %1$s was killed by an item cursed with the immensity of Knowledge
death.attack.conhecimentoRitual: %1$s was forgotten by the immensity of Knowledge summoned by %2$s
death.attack.energiaCreature: %1$s was distorted out of reality by %2$s
death.attack.energiaCurse: %1$s was killed by an item cursed with the chaos of Energy
death.attack.energiaRitual: %1$s was fried by the chaos of Energy summoned by %2$s
death.attack.medoCurse: %1$s was killed by an item cursed with an impossible flame
death.attack.morteCurse: %1$s was killed by an item cursed with the spiral of Death
death.attack.morteRitual: %1$s was consumed by the spiral of Death summoned by %2$s
death.attack.paranomalDeath: %1$s was consumed by the spiral of Death
death.attack.paranormalBlood: %1$s was torn apart by the intensity of Blood
death.attack.paranormalEnergy: %1$s was fried by the chaos of Energy
death.attack.paranormalKnowledge: %1$s was forgotten by the immensity of Knowledge
death.attack.sangueCurse: %1$s was killed by an item cursed with the intensity of Blood
death.attack.sangueRitual: %1$s was torn apart by the intensity of Blood summoned by %2$s
death.attack.vampirismoPower: %1$s had its blood drained out by %2$s
ordemparanormal.advancement.enter_fog.de: The humid atmosphere created by this dense fog is truly terrifying... Is this even natural?
ordemparanormal.advancement.learn_ritual: Aha! I finally understand this cursed item, that was it the entire time! All I needed to do was TRANSCEND...
ordemparanormal.advancement.paranormal_c: That was... What even was that?! I thought they were just tales, it can't be...
ordemparanormal.advancement.receive_powe: What a strange sensation. This is definitely not normal but... it's very cool.
ordemparanormal.advancement.root.descrip: The paranormal doesn't come to our reality easily... Or atleast it should be that way.
ordemparanormal.advancement.root.title: Other Side
ordemparanormal.devil_church_books.blood: Blood is the entity of emotion. It searches for intensity: pain, obsession, passion, love, hunger, hate - everything that involves feeling an extreme emotion pleases the entity of Blood.
Everything begins with Blood. Blood is the flow that bathes the eternity of the Other Side.
ordemparanormal.mansion_books.record_001:
Day 1: 
Jerome told me this place is safe for my habitation. The first guest told me something horrible... When I was returning from the forest, a fog appeared. It wasn't in my weather predictions... 
He had a big bite on the leg, and didn't want to talk about it...

Day 2: 
WHAT THE FUCK IS THAT?!
ordemparanormal.mansion_books.record_495: Blood brother Lairon came back from his expedition... He said that he found a portal in the supposed "Order's" plains. We recreated it and watched it closely. We will never listen to Lairon again. Damned bastard! At least we got resources from that.
ordemparanormal.nex.title: Paranormal Exposure
ordemparanormal.patchouli.manual_ocultis: Japa's Diary. $(br)Made for those who need a little push to understand the occult, and to share my experiences with the $(OS).$(br)Feel free to add new discoveries to this book... It's yours now.
ordemparanormal.power.absorver_agonia.de: You absorb the agony of those in pain. Everytime you attack, there's a chance you may heal up to 2 and a half hearts of health.
Death consumes all. When killing any being, you get an amount of hearts depending on the strength of that being.
ordemparanormal.power.adrenalina.descrip: Your body is abnormally filled with adrenaline during dangerous situations, making you more agile.
ordemparanormal.power.adrenalina_2.descr: Your entire body is able to produce high doses of adrenaline, making you even more agile when hurt.
ordemparanormal.power.afinidade_conhecim: You're connected with the entity of Knowledge, discarding the need for Knowledge ingredients and making you resistant to Knowledge effects, but also weak to Blood effects.
You're connected with the entity of Energy, discarding the need for Energy ingredients and making you resistant to Energy effects, but also weak to Knowledge effects.
ordemparanormal.power.afinidade_morte.de: You're connected with the entity of Death, discarding the need for Death ingredients and making you resistant to Death effects, but also weak to Energy effects.
ordemparanormal.power.afinidade_sangue.d: You're connected with the entity of Blood, discarding the need for Blood ingredients and making you resistant to Blood effects, but also weak to Death effects.
ordemparanormal.power.campo_protetor.des: Randomly, you might be protected by a paranormal barrier around your body while blocking an attack with a shield. The barrier will repel any attackers that hit you and set them on fire.
ordemparanormal.power.campo_protetor_2.d: Increases the distance the attacker is repelled and the amount of time the attacker will burn.
ordemparanormal.power.casualidade_fortui: When mining, there is a chance you might find rare minerals that you couldn't find before.
ordemparanormal.power.conhecimento_ampli: Expands your mind to supernatural levels, increasing the amount of rituals that you can learn.
Expands your mind to even higher levels, increasing the amount of rituals that you can learn.
ordemparanormal.power.dieta_adaptada.des: Your body adapted to absorb things that once brought you negative effects.
ordemparanormal.power.dieta_adaptada_2.d: Your body benefits from consuming grotesque and unhealthy things, giving you positive effects from eating them.
ordemparanormal.power.escapar_morte.desc: Your body can utilize lost moments to stop you from losing yours, saving you from fatal blows. But, it doesn't save you if you're already near death...
ordemparanormal.power.flagelo.descriptio: You exchange your own pain for power, receiving 2 effort points but losing 4 hearts of health.
ordemparanormal.power.gravidade_distorci: Lowers your gravity even more when used, and for a longer period of time.
ordemparanormal.power.lamina_do_medo.des: You learn the ritual Fear's Blade, which you can cast by using this power.
ordemparanormal.power.lembrar_da_morte.d: The presence of moments lost by time encourage you to go onward. When near any undead, you receive the Speed effect.
ordemparanormal.power.medo_tangivel.desc: You learn the ritual Tangible Fear, which you can cast by using this power.
You drain the potential energy of those around you, slowing them down while also making your faster.
ordemparanormal.power.potencial_aprimora: You can go past your limits, spending more effort than normal, receiving 2 effort points.
You can go even further past your limits, receiving 3 effort points.
ordemparanormal.power.potencial_reaprove: You take advantage of lost moments when receiving damage, being able to recover effort points when getting hurt.
Your blood hardens on your hand. When using this power, your next attacks using your fists will deal extra damage.
ordemparanormal.power.punho_enraivecido_: Your blood hardens permanently on your hands. All your attacks with your fists will deal extra damage.
ordemparanormal.power.putrefato.descript: Your strikes, in addition to causing damage, also alter the time perception of your target's physical matter. Unarmed strikes might cause decay.
ordemparanormal.power.putrefato_2.descri: Your strikes cause decay more frequently.
ordemparanormal.power.sangue_ferro.descr: Your veins are bathed by the paranormal, making you more resistant, providing 2 extra health hearts.
ordemparanormal.power.sangue_ferro_2.des: Your blood is completely flooded with hate and violence, providing 3 extra health hearts.
ordemparanormal.power.sangue_visceral.de: Pain awakens feelings inside you that you never thought existed. You deal more damage when hurt
ordemparanormal.power.sangue_vivo.descri: Your blood is always flowing violently, healing you faster when hurt.
ordemparanormal.power.surto_temporal.des: Your time perception is altered with a brief impulse of adrenaline, increasing the speed of your attacks.
ordemparanormal.power.vampirismo.descrip: You consume the blood of your target, dealing damage to them but healing yourself.
ordemparanormal.power.vampirismo_2.descr: Intensifies the power Vampirism, increasing the healing power and also receiving more speed.
ordemparanormal.ritual.alterar_memoria.d: Distorts the memories of your target. Villagers are more friendly towards you, lowering their prices.
ordemparanormal.ritual.amaldicoar_arma.d: Curses the weapon you're holding with knowledge sigils, now dealing more damage. Hold a sword and keep the ingredients in your inventory to use this ritual.
ordemparanormal.ritual.aprimoramento_fis: Makes your body reach extraordinary physical conditions, giving you resistance and strength effects.
ordemparanormal.ritual.arma_atroz.descri: Makes the weapon you're holding more dangerous, now dealing more damage. Hold a sword and keep the ingredients in your inventory to use this ritual.
ordemparanormal.ritual.arma_veloz.descri: Makes the weapon you're holding more swift. Hold a sword and keep the ingredients in your inventory to use this ritual.
ordemparanormal.ritual.armadura_sangue.d: Uses your blood to harden your skin, giving you four armor points.
ordemparanormal.ritual.cicatrizacao.desc: Heals three hearts for you or your target.
ordemparanormal.ritual.consumir_manancia: Consumes the surrounding life, giving you three temporary hearts of life.
ordemparanormal.ritual.decadencia.descri: Imbues your next attack with spirals inflict decay. Hold a sword and keep the ingredients in your inventory to use this ritual.
ordemparanormal.ritual.descarnar.descrip: Skins the target, dealing continuous blood damage.
ordemparanormal.ritual.espirais_da_perdi: When used, weakens the target, causing the weakness effect.
ordemparanormal.ritual.hemofagia.descrip: Sucks the target's blood, transfering four and a half hearts to you.
ordemparanormal.ritual.inexistir.descrip: Distorts your target's existance, dealing serious amounts of Knowledge damage.
ordemparanormal.ritual.lamina_do_medo.de: Conjures an impossible flame, a glimpse of something that shouldn't exist, on the blade that you're holding, which begins to deal lethal amounts of damage. Hold a sword to use this ritual.
ordemparanormal.ritual.luz.description: Creates a shiny orb of pure energy. The orb can be easily broken by human fists and is intangible.
ordemparanormal.ritual.medo_tangivel.des: Your body becomes a manifestation of Fear, making you immune to mundane effects. You become immune to any non-paranormal damage source.
ordemparanormal.ritual.perturbacao.descr: Confunses the mind of your target, making it impossible for them to move.
ordemparanormal.ritual.salto_fantasma.de: Teleports you 10 blocks away in the direction you are looking.
ordemparanormal.ritual.teleporte.descrip: If used while crouching, saves the current location, and then if used without crouching, teleports you or your target to the saved location.
ordemparanormal.ritual.transferencia_vit: Transfers four and a half hearts to your target.
ordemparanormal.ritual.velocidade_mortal: Alters the time perception of your body, that starts to reach extraordinary speeds, giving you the effect of speed.
ordemparanormal.ritual_item.ritual_learn: §7Just an item with a strange symbol.
subtitles.ordemparanormal.corpse.convert: Villager corpse converts to Blood zombie
subtitles.ordemparanormal.zumbi_sangue.c: Blood zombie converts to bestial Blood zombie
